Package bn.inference

Implementations of inference algorithms for Bayesian networks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnumerationInferencer
    Implements the depth-first inference by enumeration algorithm for exact inference in Bayesian networks described in AIMA Figure 14.9.
    GibbsSamplingInferencer
    Implements the Gibbs sampling algorithm for approximate inference in Bayesian networks described in AIMA Figure 14.16.
    LikelihoodWeightingInferencer
    Implements the likelihood weighting algorithm for approximate inference in Bayesian networks described in AIMA Figure 14.15.
    MarkovBlanketSampler
    Class implementing the method for sampling from a variable's Markov blanket, as described in AIMA 14.5.2.
    PriorSampler
    Class implementing the Prior-Sample algorithm from AIMA Section 14.5.1.
    RejectionSamplingInferencer
    Implements the rejection sampling algorithm for approximate inference in Bayesian networks described in AIMA Figure 14.14.
    WeightedSampler
    Class implementing the Weighted-Sample algorithm from AIMA Section 14.5.1.
